functions.name: list_devices
functions.description: Returns a list of all connected RGB devices

functions.name: disable_lighting
functions.description: Turns off lighting for all devices

functions.name: set_color
functions.description: Sets a specific color for a device by name

device_name.description: [optional] Name of the device to set color for. If the user does not provide a device name, the color will be set for all devices.

functions.name: set_mode
functions.description: Sets a specific lighting mode/effect for a device

device_name.description: [optional] Name of the device to set color for. If the user does not provide a device name, the color will be set for all devices.

effect_name.description: Name of the effect to set
